verses.verse: אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then יָשִֽׁיר־ <S%H7891><s%> ya-shir- Then sang מֹשֶׁה֩ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשִּׁירָ֤ה <S%H7892><s%> hash-shi-Rah this song הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> haz-zoT likewise לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and spake לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying אָשִׁ֤ירָה <S%H7891><s%> 'a-Shi-rah I will sing לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גָאֹ֣ה <S%H1342><s%> ga-'Oh for he hath triumphed גָּאָ֔ה <S%H1342><s%> ga-'Ah, gloriously ס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> sus the horse וְרֹכְב֖וֹ <S%H7392><s%> ve-ro-che-Vo and his rider רָמָ֥ה <S%H7411><s%> ra-Mah hath he thrown בַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> vai-Yam. into the sea

עָזִּ֤י <S%H5797><s%> 'az-Zi [is] my strength וְזִמְרָת֙ <S%H2176><s%> ve-zim-Rat and song יָ֔הּ <S%H3050><s%> Yah, The LORD וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- has become לִ֖י li לִֽישׁוּעָ֑ה <S%H3444><s%> li-shu-'Ah; and he is become my salvation זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh he אֵלִי֙ <S%H410><s%> 'e-Li [is] my God וְאַנְוֵ֔הוּ <S%H5115><s%> ve-'an-Ve-hu, and I will prepare him an habitation אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi my father's וַאֲרֹמְמֶֽנְהוּ׃ <S%H7311><s%> va-'a-ro-me-Men-hu. and I will exalt

יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish [is] a man מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah; of war יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo. [is] his name

מַרְכְּבֹ֥ת <S%H4818><s%> mar-ke-Vot chariots פַּרְעֹ֛ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh Pharaoh's וְחֵיל֖וֹ <S%H2426><s%> ve-chei-Lo army יָרָ֣ה <S%H3384><s%> ya-Rah hath he cast בַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> vai-Yam; into the sea וּמִבְחַ֥ר <S%H4005><s%> u-miv-Char his chosen שָֽׁלִשָׁ֖יו <S%H7991><s%> sha-li-Shav captains טֻבְּע֥וּ <S%H2883><s%> tub-be-'U also are drowned בְיַם־ <S%H3220><s%> ve-yam- sea סֽוּף׃ <S%H5488><s%> Suf. in the Red

תְּהֹמֹ֖ת <S%H8415><s%> te-ho-Mot The depths יְכַסְיֻ֑מוּ <S%H3680><s%> ye-chas-Yu-mu; have covered יָרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> ya-re-Du them they sank בִמְצוֹלֹ֖ת <S%H4688><s%> vim-tzo-Lot into the bottom כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> ke-mov- as אָֽבֶן׃ <S%H68><s%> 'A-ven. a stone

יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-ne-Cha Thy right hand יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, O LORD נֶאְדָּרִ֖י <S%H142><s%> ne'-da-Ri is become glorious בַּכֹּ֑חַ <S%H3581><s%> bak-Ko-ach; in power יְמִֽינְךָ֥ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-ne-Cha thy right hand יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD תִּרְעַ֥ץ <S%H7492><s%> tir-'Atz hath dashed in pieces אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> o-Yev. the enemy

וּבְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> u-ve-Ro And in the greatness גְּאוֹנְךָ֖ <S%H1347><s%> ge-'on-Cha of thine excellency תַּהֲרֹ֣ס <S%H2040><s%> ta-ha-Ros thou hast overthrown קָמֶ֑יךָ <S%H6965><s%> ka-Mei-cha; them that rose up against תְּשַׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> te-shal-Lach thee thou sentest forth חֲרֹ֣נְךָ֔ <S%H2740><s%> cha-Ro-ne-cha, thy wrath יֹאכְלֵ֖מוֹ <S%H398><s%> yo-che-Le-mov [which] consumed כַּקַּֽשׁ׃ <S%H7179><s%> kak-Kash. them as stubble

וּבְר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> u-ve-Ru-ach And with the blast אַפֶּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pei-cha of thy nostrils נֶ֣עֶרְמוּ <S%H6192><s%> Ne-'er-mu were gathered together מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, the waters נִצְּב֥וּ <S%H5324><s%> nitz-tze-Vu stood upright כְמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> che-mov- like נֵ֖ד <S%H5067><s%> ned as an heap נֹזְלִ֑ים <S%H5140><s%> no-ze-Lim; the floods קָֽפְא֥וּ <S%H7087><s%> ka-fe-'U were congealed תְהֹמֹ֖ת <S%H8415><s%> te-ho-Mot [and] the depths בְּלֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> be-lev- in the heart יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> Yam. of the sea

אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said אוֹיֵ֛ב <S%H341><s%> o-Yev The enemy אֶרְדֹּ֥ף <S%H7291><s%> 'er-Dof I will pursue אַשִּׂ֖יג <S%H5381><s%> 'as-Sig I will overtake אֲחַלֵּ֣ק <S%H2505><s%> 'a-chal-Lek I will divide שָׁלָ֑ל <S%H7998><s%> sha-Lal; the spoil תִּמְלָאֵ֣מוֹ <S%H4390><s%> tim-la-'E-mov shall be satisfied נַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, my lust אָרִ֣יק <S%H7324><s%> 'a-Rik upon them I will draw חַרְבִּ֔י <S%H2719><s%> char-Bi, my sword תּוֹרִישֵׁ֖מוֹ <S%H3423><s%> to-ri-She-mov shall destroy יָדִֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di. my hand

נָשַׁ֥פְתָּ <S%H5398><s%> na-Shaf-ta Thou didst blow בְרוּחֲךָ֖ <S%H7307><s%> ve-ru-cha-Cha with thy wind כִּסָּ֣מוֹ <S%H3680><s%> kis-Sa-mov covered יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> Yam; the sea צָֽלֲלוּ֙ <S%H6749><s%> tza-la-Lu them they sank כַּֽעוֹפֶ֔רֶת <S%H5777><s%> ka-'o-Fe-ret, as lead בְּמַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> be-Ma-yim waters אַדִּירִֽים׃ <S%H117><s%> 'ad-di-Rim. in the mighty

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who כָמֹ֤כָה <S%H3644><s%> cha-Mo-chah is like בָּֽאֵלִם֙ <S%H410><s%> ba-'e-Lim the gods יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, Who [is] like unto thee O LORD מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who כָּמֹ֖כָה <S%H3644><s%> ka-Mo-chah is like נֶאְדָּ֣ר <S%H142><s%> ne'-Dar majestic בַּקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> bak-Ko-desh; in holiness נוֹרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> no-Ra fearful תְהִלֹּ֖ת <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-Lot [in] praises עֹ֥שֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'O-seh doing פֶֽלֶא׃ <S%H6382><s%> Fe-le. marvellous thing

נָטִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H5186><s%> na-Ti-ta Thou stretchedst out יְמִ֣ינְךָ֔ <S%H3225><s%> ye-Mi-ne-cha, thy right hand תִּבְלָעֵ֖מוֹ <S%H1104><s%> tiv-la-'E-mov swallowed אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. the earth

[which] thy hands
יְהוָ֥ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD יִמְלֹ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> yim-Loch shall reign לְעֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> va-'Ed. and ever

וַתִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-Kach took מִרְיָ֨ם <S%H4813><s%> mir-Yam And Miriam הַנְּבִיאָ֜ה <S%H5031><s%> han-ne-vi-'Ah the prophetess אֲח֧וֹת <S%H269><s%> a-Chot the sister אַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַתֹּ֖ף <S%H8596><s%> hat-Tof a timbrel בְּיָדָ֑הּ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dah; in her hand וַתֵּצֶ֤אןָ <S%H3318><s%> vat-te-Tze-na went out כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol and all הַנָּשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> han-na-Shim and all the women אַחֲרֶ֔יהָ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-ha, after בְּתֻפִּ֖ים <S%H8596><s%> be-tup-Pim her with timbrels וּבִמְחֹלֹֽת׃ <S%H4246><s%> u-vim-cho-Lot. and with dances

וַתַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> vat-Ta-'an answered לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem מִרְיָ֑ם <S%H4813><s%> mir-Yam; And Miriam שִׁ֤ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> Shi-ru them Sing לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh ye to the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גָאֹ֣ה <S%H1342><s%> ga-'Oh for he hath triumphed גָּאָ֔ה <S%H1342><s%> ga-'Ah, gloriously ס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> sus the horse וְרֹכְב֖וֹ <S%H7392><s%> ve-ro-che-Vo and his rider רָמָ֥ה <S%H7411><s%> ra-Mah hath he thrown בַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> vai-Yam. into the sea ס sa-Mek

וַיַּסַּ֨ע <S%H5265><s%> vai-yas-Sa' brought מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh So Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel מִיַּם־ <S%H3220><s%> mi-yam- sea ס֔וּף <S%H5488><s%> Suf, from the Red וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-tze-'U and they went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into מִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> mid-bar- into the wilderness שׁ֑וּר <S%H7793><s%> Shur; of Shur וַיֵּלְכ֧וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu went שְׁלֹֽשֶׁת־ <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-shet- three יָמִ֛ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar in the wilderness וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no מָ֥צְאוּ <S%H4672><s%> Ma-tze-'u and found מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. no water

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u And when they came מָרָ֔תָה <S%H4785><s%> ma-Ra-tah, to Marah וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יָֽכְל֗וּ <S%H3201><s%> ya-che-Lu, they could לִשְׁתֹּ֥ת <S%H8354><s%> lish-Tot not drink מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> ma-yim of the waters מִמָּרָ֔ה <S%H4785><s%> mi-ma-Rah, of Marah כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מָרִ֖ים <S%H4751><s%> ma-Rim for they [were] bitter הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem; like עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken of it was קָרָֽא־ <S%H7121><s%> ka-ra- of it was called שְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mah therefore the name מָרָֽה׃ <S%H4785><s%> ma-Rah.
